page.title: 07Local News.
page.content: On Saturday 8th June "Largo Fair" was held in Upper Largo.A considerable amount of money was raised for the church funds.The annual open air service took place on Sun. 6th June on the site of the old kirk at Newburn.Concerts have been held in Largo for the "1100 Celebrations" The Largo Hotel is participating in the East Neuk Food Festival week. The Crusoe Hotel,Lower Largo, will also be participating in "the week" which is being promoted by the Scottish Tourist Board and N.E Fife area, to promote seafood and tourism. Not only will they have special daily menu's featuring seafood but there will also be a fancy dress "Fisherman,Sailors and Wenches' Dance"
